column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My friend put our name down
column2: so we got there right when were getting seated. Lou Malnati's was my first deep dish pizza experience and it's equal to or better than regular pizza. I could see myself getting tired of it really quick. But I loved the crust! I NEVER eat crust because its always so bland and not worth the extra calories
column3: but it was so soft and butter here
